title: Roasted Brussels sprouts with apple
ingredients: ['500g frozen Brussels sprouts', '2 apples - peeled, cored and sliced into chunks', '2 onions, sliced into chunks', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, or as needed', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon']
